reviews.sentence: the typical business hotel. typical business hotel the room was small and bit crowded the bathroom small as well very clean and confortable internet connection was not so great typical european breakfast very very small gym area around the hotel nice.
The breakfast was excelentI prefer a separate toilet and there were water stains on the ceiling of the corridor. I prefer one large bed instead of two smaller ones.

A Good Choice. The hotel drops in a quiet residential area which is about 4 stops away from the central hbf station a little bit off the city but acceptable. The hotel itself has been built for many years but refurblish 2 years ago so everything is functionable and looks under well maintained. Staff is always friendly the pool is nice with warm water the free tea lounge is interesting. The morning buffet breakfast is okay but I feel bored at the third day since the food is exactly the same everyday. Afteral this hotel is a good choice at Hamburg especially the room rate is quite reasonable at Euro 95 per night including breakfast. I would recommend to everyone who will make a visit to Hamburg.

Good Choice in Hamburg. Good hotel. Stayed on a business trip. Subway close by taxis at the door step and access to the Alster lake. Tea lounge and coffee available in the reception area was welcome. The TV in the room was strange very small screen and funny when first switched on with its colours. Once you got into the TV channels it was fine but I thought the room could definitely have a much more modern piece of equipment. Staff was nice and friendly. Ate at the restaurant twice and found it decent if slightly expensive. Breakfast was substantial with a lot of choices. I would stay here again.

Good hotel but can be improved. I did not want to give it an average score as it is better but very good is a little too much. For the price you are paying you should be expecting more. Although it is clear that the hotel received a make over the furniture in the rooms looked like they were saved from before. The very small TV looks rather funny and does not provide for a pleasant piece of entertainment. Trying to regulate the temperature in your room is a nightmare what ever I tried to do the temperature did not drop below 12 degrees C Opening the window was the only option but that created a nasty draft. Paying 22 Euros for breakfast is to me on the high side. But aside from that the beds are nice and soft the area around the hotel is quite so a good night sleep near the center of Hamburg is perfect. The temperature of the show can be regulated perfectly. The restaurant and bar are doable. Service was perfect all staff spoke English and I believe the lady behind the bar spoken even more languages. The parking garage has an easy access and wide enough spaces for modern cars. The perks for an IHG gold member were limited to probably free wifi. breakfast coupons would have been nice.

Excellent but beware of restaurant. Friendly courteous staff well appointed room free wi fi nice atmosphere. The one serious drawback restaurant bar forgetful service over priced no TLC eg a bit of bread with my so called pasta bolognese. Safe bet eat out. Otherwise highly recommended and the price is right.

Good. Pool and the extensive opening hours of pool. Excellent breakfast and also here convenient to choose breakfast time within a long timeframe. The automatic sensor minibar refrigirator arrangement with fully stuffed referring not allowing any space for own snacks and other personal keep cold items.

Good hotel good service worth to stay if price is right. Good business hotel or even for leisure as it is well located next to the lake and in a nice trendy neighbourhood 10 mns away from the center and the train stationThe hotel is slowly ageing and would need an overall renovation but this is not a show stopper. You see that the design is from another period but everything is fit and clean. During my last stay I was upgraded to a suite the first time in my 4 stays in this venue. It has a parking under the venue but with a cumbersome access to the reception once you a reparked as you have to walk down and up some staircases under the venue so not convenient at all if you carry a large suitcase. The hotel is equipped with a nice gym and an internal pool and has a nice and quite business lounge on the top floor with a balcony terrace. The hotel is fairly large very clean with a large TV channels acesthere is free wifi access in the room I guess this is part of the perks of being Platinum with HIG and the parking charge was normal. Breakfast is rather expensive if booked at arrival. They are probably better hotels in the city but the quality is consistent with the price for that expensive city. This hotel is a good choice as no bad surprise should arise there and the hotel personal is rather helpful.

OK but an average Crowne Plaza. Just spent 3night at this hotel and overall an average experience. Location wise hotel is a bit far from downtown and it does take about 10 15 minutes to walk there although you do have the choice of taking the nearby U3 subway or M6 bus. The saving grace is it is also within 3 5 minute walking distance to a wonderful residential area called St George where you find lots of nice shops and good restaurants. Check in upon arrival was speedy and pretty painless and so was the check out. Front desk staff was very nice and upgraded me to a Club Room which unfortunately looks absolutely nothing special to me at all other than free wifi there is no welcome fruit cookie plate and the room is just about the same size cramped as any Holiday Inn room except the furniture may be a bit nicer. Room decor is rather old fashioned and may I also say a bit outdated. But in all it is clean tidy and since I am not spending tons of time at hotel it is manageable. Unfortunately Crowne Plaza similar to InterContinental same IHG family does not always automatically give you full benefits such as Club Lounge access even you are the highest standing member. This means you have to pay for food and drink on your own. The cost was 35 euro extra per night. considering breakfast is additional 15 20 euro per day and front desk was willing to offer me a discount of 25 euro for lounge access per day with free drinks and simple meals I decided to take the offer. IHG Group please re think how you treat your elite members Mariot and Hilton are always nicer to their elite members why can not youIn all I would consider my experience at CP Hamburg this time totally OK and the price was much better than almost all other hotels in town including my preferred choices of Mariot and Renaissance due to a big convention in town. But honestly speaking I felt like I was longing the whole time for some better treatments that a premier IHG member deserves. especially when you were told you have to pay for everything and you could not even get a fresh supply of toilette during your entire stay. It just makes you wonder what is the point of or why bother being a IHG premier member then. Among all CP properties I have stayed in Europe thus far unfortunately to say Crowne Plaza Hamburg will not likely be a top choice on my list. I think I will try other choices next time when I am in town.

Mini Bar is scary. It must have seemed a good idea to some geek but not to a travelerIf you take an item out of the mini bar to examine it look at alcohol content preservatives etc. and you do not get it back within about 30 seconds it gets charged to your bilthere is no room to store your own fresh milk etc so in many ways this room does not have a useable bar fridge at alThe shower has a CURTAIN. I hate shower curtains. I do not think I have seen one for 10 yearsWiFi is fast and efficient. Room is comfortable would have liked 2 armchairs in a double romProbably would look for somewhere else next time plenty of hotels in the area.
od convenient Hotel. A nice hotel with good facilities and located well near good restaurants.

Second visit to this excellent hotel. Our second visit to this excellent hotel within reasonable walking distance of Hamburg town centre. We could walk down a road of restaurants and shops or along the Alster lake bank. Room clean comfortable and well appointed. Staff all very pleasant and helpful. Club lounge one of the best with decent snacks and drinks throughout the day. The number 6 bus stops just outside the hotel and this proved a very useful route as it goes to the harbour district where the huge model railway is located and also to the town centre with its excellent shops the Christmas Market etc. We will definitely use this hotel on future visits to Hamburg.

I like to stay more time if I have meeting at Hamburg Very good hotel. Buffet Bfast is very good. Staffs are so friendly Rom is comfortable but no central heater at the night time is quite cold only potable heater provided.

Good stay. Stayed here for just one night. Restaurant was closed for a private function but had a meal in the bar. Food was very nice and service was great. Hotel is in a good area for walking so treated myself to a bit of sightseeing. Rooms are very nice breakfast was great too. More than happy to stay here again.

Exceptional. The staff was very professional and courteous. We arrived early and our room was not ready yet so they upgraded our reservation to a bigger room. Nice selection of complimentary teas in the lobby. There are a few free parking places at the hotel entrance which we were able to use. The hotel is located very close to the Alster lake.

Nice out of centre location. This hotel is a bit out of the centre but near transport and in a very nice rather ritzy leafy suburban area over from the lake therefore with access to a good lakeside walking path. A couple of blocks away there is a cluster of restaurants so plenty of choice. Our room was plain and unadorned but had everything we needed and the bed and pillows were comfy. The buffet breakfast was great with lots of better than usual foods and an egg station working overtime.

Good hotel and nice breakfast bar. The rooms were clean and nice but a bit loud and the bathroom was in good order too. In general we got everything we needed. Friendly staff and good breakfast. The bar is also quite nice and the hotel is in a pretty good location.
Location. The room was fantastic and the breakfast was great for a hotel under renovations I think the price was a little ambitious but I would return.

Good. Breakfast is very rich and tasty variety of choice. Bed is very comfortable. Easy to reach with a busthe renovation in the lobby. Need to get 1 flour upstairs with luggage. And smell of concrete.
Excellent. Very comfy bed nice room decor amazing breakfast not huge quantity of food but very delicious and very quiet place in walking distance to centrum 15 20mins walk. Overall great stay.
